author: ahinzmann
body:
Backport of #8195 

This module takes pat::Jets as input, updates JEC and Userdata information and writes out new pat::Jets.
The use case is to run on MiniAOD samples with outdated JEC and missing Userdata.

The test configuration "PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/test/update_jets_from_MiniAOD.py" tests boths features.
patJetsUpdated gives the jets with JEC from the given global tag and additional user data.
patJetsUndoJEC removes JEC from patJetUpdated
patJetsReapplyJEC reapplies JEC on patJetsUndoJEC
title: New producer to update JEC and Userdata of pat::Jets
